explanation: Majority of opinions are bullish on BTC, with several calling for price targets above 108k and 110k, referencing ongoing volume and positive market sentiment. There is discussion of dollar weakness (which supports BTC uptrend), and repeated affirmations of price breaking new highs. Only minor caution was raised if BTC cannot hold above 108k, but most sentiment is positive.
representative_opinions: jeff gates: let the weak sell at 108 and let the strong make the money
I-Dub: It's going up forever Laura
oscartg638: no poly. when dollar goes up btc goes down. when dollar goes down, btc is up.
Alina Bogdan: a big short incoming IF(big IF) we cant hold 108 and close above 109k
